events.description: Nico Hoerner reaches on a fielding error by shortstop Paul DeJong.
Seiya Suzuki lines out to right fielder Lars Nootbaar. 1 out
Nico Hoerner steals (17) 2nd base. Nico Hoerner to 3rd. Nico Hoerner advances to 3rd, on a missed catch error by second baseman Nolan Gorman.
Christopher Morel called out on strikes. 2 outs
Dansby Swanson singles on a ground ball to right fielder Lars Nootbaar. Nico Hoerner scores.
Ian Happ walks. Dansby Swanson to 2nd.
Trey Mancini doubles (10) on a fly ball to center fielder Tommy Edman. Dansby Swanson scores. Ian Happ scores.
Miguel Amaya doubles (2) on a ground ball to left fielder Brendan Donovan, deflected by third baseman Nolan Arenado. Trey Mancini scores.
Nick Madrigal flies out to right fielder Lars Nootbaar. 3 outs
